title: Standard Lyndon loop words: weighted orders
authors:
Severyn Khomych, Nazar Korniichuk, Kostiantyn Molokanov, and Alexander
  Tsymbaliuk
abstract:
We generalize the study of standard Lyndon loop words from [A.Negut,
A.Tsymbaliuk, "Quantum loop groups and shuffle algebras via Lyndon words", Adv.
Math. 439 (2024), Paper No. 109482] to a more general class of orders on the
underlying alphabet, as suggested in Remark 3.15 of loc.cit. The main new
ingredient is the exponent-tightness of these words, which also allows to
generalize the construction of PBW bases of the untwisted quantum loop algebra
via the combinatorics of loop words.
